categories: Category:Battles of the Great Galactic War

nodes.text: Battle on the Ash Plains of Lenico IV

During the Great Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire, a battle occurred on the Outer Rim world of Lenico IV in the Cademimu sector. The engagement, which took place on Lenico's barren and inhospitable Ash Plains, was participated in by at least one of the apprentices of Jedi Master Ngani Zho—Satele Shan, Syo Bakarn, Jaric Kaedan, and Bela Kiwiiks.

The battle on the Ash Plains of Lenico IV was first mentioned in The Lost Suns, Part 1—the seventh entry in the Star Wars: The Old Republic comic series. The comic, released in 2011, was penned by Alexander Freed.
